description.narrative: The objective of the Project is to improve the accountability and reporting of the central government’s Specific Purpose Grants(DAK) for basic infrastructure, consisting of roads, irrigation, water and sanitation, within Selected Local Governments.

condition.narrative: Article V, 5.01. Effectiveness; Termination. i) MPW shall have issued a Ministerial Circular Letter requiring the use of theSupplemental Technical Guidelines (Environmental and Social Safeguards) all Selected Local Governments; and ii) the VO Terms ofReference have been agreed between the Borrower and BPKP, and between the Bank and BPKP, and BPKP and the Bank shall have enteredinto the Verification Arrangement.
Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section I.A | Description :Institutional Arrangements | Frequency :Yearly
Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section I.B.1 | Description :Project Operations Manual | Due Date :23-Sep-2010
Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section I.B.2 | Description :Compliance to Sub-project Technical Guidelines | Frequency :Yearly
Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section I.B.3 | Description :Submission of Reference Unit Costs | Frequency :Yearly
Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section I.B.5 | Description :Output verification and reimbursement procedures | Frequency :Yearly
Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section I.C | Description :Implementation Arrangements for Part 2 and Part 3 | Frequency :Yearly
Schedule 2, Section I.A.6. BPKP shall […] undertake Verification of Outputs for the Project.
Schedule 2, Section I.B.1(b). The Borrower shall update the Operations Manual by no later than 30 days after the Effective Date.

Schedule 2, Section I.B.5(c) | Description :Review of the application of the Supplemental Technical Guidelines (Environmental andSocial Safeguards) and amend the Supplement if so requested by the Bank | Due Date :31-Oct-2015

Schedule 2, Section I.B.5(d) | Description : Allocate DAK funds for Selected Local Governments for each Fiscal Year and shallnotify the Bank | Frequency :annually, no later than March 31 in each Fiscal Year

Schedule 2, Section I.C.2(b) | Description : Submit a Work Plan for verification activities, including technical and environmentaland social safeguards capacity | Frequency :annually, no later than January 1 in each Fiscal Year
Schedule 2, Section III.D | Description :ULP functioning for all procurement using LGDP funds | Due Date :31-Dec-2014

title.narrative: Contracts with quality of outputs delivered according to contract by December 31
% of contracts with work completed with documented physical handover by December 31
Percentage of LGs that receive DAK payment 1 from MoF by March 31.
MoF produce annual M&E reports for the project, mid-term evaluation report and final evaluation report

target.value: Annual and quarterly project report and IFRs, Annual M&E, Mid-Term Evaluation, and Final Evaluation Reports are submitted on time.

actual.value: PIU has submitted the LGDP impact analyses report but not yet submitting the IFRs for Q2-Q4 FY 2016 and Q1 FY 2017, as well as the2016 project annual report.

title.narrative: Supplement of MPW Technical Guidelines on Safeguard issued by MPW Ministerial Circular letter

baseline.value: The original MPW Technical Guidelines do not include Safeguards issues.

target.value: Issuance of the MPW Supplement Technical Guidelines, include Safeguards.

title.narrative: Maintain an issued Supplement of the MPW's Technical Guidelines on Environmental and Safeguards through MPW Circular Letter applicable to all Selected Local Governments in each FY
% of LGs with functioning procurement unit (ULP)
% DAK reports submitted online through Web-Based Reporting System
% of physical outputs reported, verified, and meeting eligibility criteria
BPKP submits to PIU a quantitative and qualitative Verification Report consistent with the TORs for the same as specified in the Verification Arrangement by May 31
Issuance by BPKP of Verification Manual and socialization of BPKP regional representatives by February 28 of each FY
